mappings.note: Noted spelling error in UDS3 REDCap

mappings.UDS3_value:
None - 0
No language difficulty or occasional mild tip-of-the-tongue.
mappings.UDS4_value:
None = 0
No language difficulty or occasional mild tip-of-the-tongue

mappings.UDS3_value:
Questionable - 0.5
Consistent mild word finding difficulties; simplification of word choice; circumlocution; decreased phrase length; and/or mild comprehension difficulties.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Questionable = 0.5
Consistent mild word-finding difficulties; simplification of word choice; circumlocution; decreased phrase length; and/or mild comprehension difficulties

mappings.UDS3_value:
Mild - 1
Moderate word finding difficulty in speech; cannot name objects in environment; reduced phrase length and/or agrammatical speech; and/or reduced comprehension in conversation and reading.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Mild = 1
Moderate word-finding difficulty in speech; cannot name objects in environment; reduced phrase length and/or agrammatical speech and/or reduced comprehension in conversation and reading

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Moderate to severe impairments in either speech or comprehension; has difficulty communicating thoughts; writing may be slightly more effective.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Moderate to severe impairments in either speech or comprehension; has difficulty communicating thoughts; writing may be slightly more effective

mappings.UDS3_value:
None - 0
Independent function at usual level in job, shopping, volunteer and social groups.
mappings.UDS4_value:
None = 0
Independent function at usual level in job, shopping, volunteer and social groups

mappings.UDS3_value:
Mild - 1
Unable to function independently at these activities, although may still be engaged in some; appears normal to casual inspection.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Mild = 1
Unable to function independently at these activities, although may still be engaged in some; appears normal to casual inspection

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
No pretense of independent function outside the home; appears well enough to be taken to functions outside the family home.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
No pretense of independent function outside the home; appears well enough to be taken to functions outside the family home

mappings.UDS3_value:
Severe - 3
No pretense of independent function outside the home; appears too ill to be taken to functions outside the family home.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Severe = 3
No pretense of independent function outside the home; appears too ill to be taken to functions outside the family home

mappings.UDS3_value:
Questionable - 0.5
Questionable changes in comportment, empathy, appropriateness of actions.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Questionable = 0.5
Questionable changes in comportment, empathy, appropriateness of actions

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Moderate behavioral changes, affecting interpersonal relationships and interactions in a significant manner.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Moderate behavioral changes, affecting interpersonal relationships and interactions in a significant manner

mappings.UDS3_value:
Severe - 3
Severe behavioral changes, making interpersonal interactions all unidirectional.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Severe = 3
Severe behavioral changes, making interpersonal interactions all unidirectional

mappings.UDS3_value:
None - 0
Life at home, hobbies, and intellectual interests well maintained.
mappings.UDS4_value:
None = 0
Life at home, hobbies, and intellectual interests well maintained

mappings.UDS3_value:
Questionable - 0.5
Life at home, hobbies, and intellectual interests slightly impaired.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Questionable = 0.5
Life at home, hobbies, and intellectual interests slightly impaired

mappings.UDS3_value:
Mild - 1
Mild but definite impairment of function at home; more difficult chores abandoned; more complicated hobbies and interests abandoned.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Mild = 1
Mild but definite impairment of function at home; more difficult chores abandoned; more complicated hobbies and interests abandoned

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Only simple chores preserved; very restricted interests, poorly maintained.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Only simple chores preserved; very restricted interests, poorly maintained

mappings.UDS3_value:
None - 0
Solves everyday problems, handles business & financial affairs well; judgment good in relation to past performance.
mappings.UDS4_value:
None = 0
Solves everyday problems, handles business & financial affairs well; judgment good in relation to past performance

mappings.UDS3_value:
Questionable - 0.5
Slight impairment in solving problems, similarities, and differences.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Questionable = 0.5
Slight impairment in solving problems, similarities, and differences

mappings.UDS3_value:
Mild - 1
Moderate difficulty in handling problems, similarities, and differences; social judgment usually maintained.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Mild = 1
Moderate difficulty in handling problems, similarities, and differences; social judgment usually maintained

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Severely impaired in handling problems, similarities, and differences; social judgment usually impaired.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Severely impaired in handling problems, similarities, and differences; social judgment usually impaired

mappings.UDS3_value:
Severe - 3
Unable to make judgments or solve problems.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Severe = 3
Unable to make judgments or solve problems

mappings.UDS4_value: B4 Global Staging-CDR: Clinical Dementia Rating - Language

mappings.UDS3_value:
None - 0
No memory loss, or slight inconsistent forgetfulness.
mappings.UDS4_value:
None = 0
No memory loss, or slight inconsistent forgetfulness

mappings.UDS3_value:
Questionable - 0.5
Consistent slight forgetfulness; partial recollection of events; "benign" forgetfulness.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Questionable = 0.5
Consistent slight forgetfulness; partial recollection of events; "benign" forgetfulness

mappings.UDS3_value:
Mild - 1
Moderate memory loss, more marked for recent events; defect interferes with everyday activities.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Mild = 1
Moderate memory loss, more marked for recent events; defect interferes with everyday activities

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Severe memory loss; only highly learned material retained; new material rapidly lost.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Severe memory loss; only highly learned material retained; new material rapidly lost

mappings.UDS3_value:
Questionable - 0.5
Fully oriented except for slight difficulty with time relationships.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Questionable = 0.5
Fully oriented except for slight difficulty with time relationships

mappings.UDS3_value:
Mild - 1
Moderate difficulty with time relationships; oriented for place at examination; may have geographic disorientation elsewhere.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Mild = 1
Moderate difficulty with time relationships; oriented for place at examination; may have geographic disorientation elsewhere

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Severe difficulty with time relationships; usually disoriented to time, often to place.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Severe difficulty with time relationships; usually disoriented to time, often to place

mappings.UDS3_value:
Moderate - 2
Requires assistance in dressing, hygiene, keeping of personal effects.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Moderate = 2
Requires assistance in dressing, hygiene, keeping of personal effects

mappings.UDS3_value:
Severe - 3
Requires much help with personal care; frequent incontinence.
mappings.UDS4_value:
Severe = 3
Requires much help with personal care; frequent incontinence
